title: Kissing Frosty/ The Boss, the Baby and the Bride
description: MAGIC IN THE AIR . . . Megan McGraw is finally ready to settle down and find the perfect man. So she and her New Age friend cast a spell on a snowman, and summon up a vision of a favorite movie star. It's all good fun, until the dream boat actually walks into Megan's restaurant the next day! Of course it's not the actor who gets Megan riled up. It's his mocking, evil-tempered, extremely attractive sidekick . . . KISSING FROSTY by Anne Stuart Reed Harding has gone through twelve secretaries in six months. It takes a certain type of woman to work for the quick-tempered businessman. Someone like Angie Makepeace, for instance. There's only on thing wrong with secretary number thirteen that Reed can see: she's convinced she's his guardian angel! THE BOSS, THE BABY AND THE BRIDE by Day Leclaire
author: Anne Stuart
